content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Haoyu Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Hello, Mr. Wang. It's my pleasure to have you here. I'm sure you'll find the apartment to your liking. Regarding the rental price, I'm looking for a fair market rate that reflects the quality of the property. How much were you considering?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: That sounds fair. Considering the apartment is unfurnished and has a size of 50 square meters, I would suggest a reasonable price of 600 euros per month.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: I appreciate your offer, but I must admit, 600 euros seems a bit low for the location and the amenities the apartment offers. However, I'm willing to negotiate. Would you be open to discussing a higher price?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Sure, I am always open to negotiations. Considering the quality of the property and its location, I am willing to increase the price to 700 euros per month.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Thank you for your flexibility, Mr. Wang. While 700 euros is closer to what I had in mind, I'd like to push a bit further. How about 750 euros per month? This would cover the costs of maintenance and upkeep of the property, and I believe it's a fair price for both parties.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand your point. 750 euros per month is quite a high price for an unfurnished 50 square meter apartment. However, I am willing to meet you halfway. I can offer 725 euros per month.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Your offer is appreciated, Mr. Wang. Let's settle on 725 euros per month. I believe this is a fair price that reflects the value of the apartment. Shall we proceed with the paperwork?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I agree to the price of [725] Euro!
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Excellent! I'm glad we could come to an agreement. Now, let's discuss the terms of the lease and the deposit. Would you be comfortable with a two-month deposit and a one-year lease term?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: That sounds reasonable to me. I agree to the deposit and lease term. Please proceed with the paperwork.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Wonderful! I'll have my lawyer draft the lease agreement and send it to you for your review. Once you've signed it and paid the deposit, we can schedule a move-in date. Is there anything else you would like to discuss?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: No, I don't have any other questions or concerns at this time. Thank you for your time and cooperation, Mr. Schmidt. I look forward to moving into the apartment.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: You're welcome, Mr. Wang. I'm glad to have you as a tenant. If you have any issues or need assistance with anything regarding the apartment, please do not hesitate to contact me. Enjoy your new home!
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you, Mr. Schmidt. I appreciate your help and understanding. TERMINATE
name: Haoyu Wang from China
